title: HPRCA Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 600 Junior Basic Teacher Posts
description: Himachal Pradesh Rajya Chayan Aayog (HPRCA) has published the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 600 Junior Basic Teacher Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th, B.Ed., and Post Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the HPRCA Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online th...
